title: Some Britons fear Sunak is too rich to understand working-class suffering.
description: A British worker earning the median wage would have to have been working since the Stone Age to amass the new prime ministerâ€™s fortune, one group estimated.
dc:creator: Emma Bubola
media:description: Rishi Sunak, left, and his wife, Akshata Murty, were estimated to be worth more than $800 million, according to The Times of London.
